verses.name: 2 Kings 10:10
verses.text: Know now that there shall fall unto the earth nothing of the word of the Lord, which the Lord spake concerning the house of Ahab: for the Lord hath done that which he spake by his servant Elijah.

verses.name: 2 Kings 10:11
verses.text: So Jehu slew all that remained of the house of Ahab in Jezreel, and all his great men, and his kinsfolks, and his priests, until he left him none remaining.

verses.name: 2 Kings 10:12
verses.text: And he arose and departed, and came to Samaria. And as he was at the shearing house in the way,
